Objetivo: Realiza el diseño de arquitecturas de acuerdo con las mejores prácticas vigentes, siguiendo los lineamientos indicados por el Gerente de Ingeniería y los estándares de calidad definidos por la empresa, da soporte preventa al área comercial basado en infraestructura y servicios en la nube, asimismo, investiga nuevas tecnologías para aportar soluciones. Diseñar arquitecturas y soluciones de servicios de acuerdo con las necesidades del cliente, analizando, levantando y documentando los requerimientos funcionales, planea a detalle cómo será la implementación de la solución, desde los puntos de vista servicio, infraestructura, tecnologías, mediciones, monitoreo, etc. Debe considerar la sustentabilidad de la solución con miras a futuro y a las posibles integraciones que la solución pueda requerir, con la finalidad de generar valor en la propuesta al cliente.

Dar soporte y asesoría técnica al área de ventas, basado en infraestructura y servicios en la nube a fin de contribuir en el incremento de ingresos y cumplimiento de los objetivos organizacionales.
Investigar y recomendar la aplicación de mejores prácticas y uso de servicios relacionados con infraestructura y servicios en la nube, con el propósito de contribuir en las soluciones de los diferentes proyectos y garantizar la eficiencia del área de Ingeniería, así como la mejora de sus habilidades tecnológicas a través de la exhaustiva investigación.

Estudiante universitario de tercer año en adelante de Ingeniería en Sistemas o carrera en el campo de Tecnología de la Información. De no cumplir con el perfil académico puede sustituirse por 5 años de experiencia en manejo de infraestructura de redes, sistemas operaciones y software.

Descripción
Would you like to lead the GenAI strategy for the Latin America Startup team at AWS? Do you have the technical insight, business savvy, and relationship development skills, to interact with the startup ecosystem to help further establish Amazon as the leader in GenAI?

We are looking for a teammate to lead our GenAI strategy in Latin America. This is an individual contributor role that will interact with the startup team. This team is comprised of startup founders/operators who champion and work alongside the world's best startups and investors in ML, artificial intelligence (AI), and data science. We do what is in our power to accelerate their engineering and commercial efforts from inception to IPO, leveraging our people, technology, knowledge, programs, and relationships within and outside Amazon.

The ideal candidate will possess both a business background and deep GenAI technical expertise that enables them to drive engagements and interact with founders and general partners, as well as sufficient technical knowledge that enables them to comfortably and effectively interact with CTOs, software developers, and architects. This individual will have the exciting opportunity to create and deliver a startup strategy, which includes working one-on-one with startups, launching scalable programs, and being a key member within the ML ecosystem. They should also have a demonstrated ability to think strategically and analytically about business, product, and technical challenges, with the ability to build and convey compelling value propositions and work cross-organizationally to build consensus. You'll be expected to execute in the face of ambiguity, shifting priorities, and limited resources. Competency in cloud computing will be required for ongoing success - as is a keen sense of ownership, curiosity, scrappiness, and drive.

Roles & Responsibilities:

* Identifying and engaging the founders/leaders of newly founded and venture-backed GenAI startups to 1) identify their technical and commercial challenges/opportunities 2) map those needs onto people, technology, knowledge, programs, relationships across Amazon that could potentially help and 3) mobilize those assets to work on behalf of these startup customers.

* Acting as the voice of the startup customer by discovering, capturing, and reporting back patterns and learnings from the field about opportunities as they relate to GenAI.

* Developing and holding relationships with key influencers in the startup ecosystem focused on GenAI (e.g., venture funds, accelerators, university labs and programs). Activities include putting Amazon assets to work on behalf of their portfolio companies, driving customer and partner relationships for the portfolio, jointly producing thought leadership and educational events and/or the broader startup ecosystem.

* Collaborating with colleagues across the global Startup Business Development, Marketing and Sales teams to better serve the needs of customers leveraging GenAI technologies.

* Producing GenAI thought leadership and technical-leaning content, workshops, and events for the startup ecosystem. Serving as a technical evangelist and GenAI subject matter expert within AWS and externally.

* Informing, influencing, and contributing to the work of other GenAI-related colleagues across AWS and Amazon including sales, marketing, business development, solutions architecture and product teams. Contributing to the development of our GenAI strategy.

* Conceiving, authoring, securing support for, launching and executing new initiatives and programs to meet the needs of startup customers as they relate to GenAI.
